task_description: Facing the building to your South-West (approx. 224°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to look up to see the top of the structure since my current pitch is level with the ground.
I need to adjust my heading to face the building directly at 224°SW to accurately assess its height.
To estimate the building's height, I need to look up again to see the top of the structure while facing the correct heading.
I need to correct my heading to face the building directly at 224°SW while keeping the pitch up to see the top.
With the correct heading and pitch, I can now estimate the height of the building by analyzing its visible structure from ground to roof.
